viewData.name: Samsung K4000 32" Class HD Multi-System LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung K4000 32" Class HD Multi-System LED TV featuring Multi-System Compatible, HD 1366 x 768 LED Panel 2 x HDMI / 2 x USB. Review Samsung K4000
viewData.long_description: Enjoy HD resolution across NTSC, PAL, and SECAM TV systems with the Samsung K4000 32" Class HD Multi-System LED TV. It is equipped with a 32" LED-backlit LCD panel and features a 1366 x 768 native resolution for viewing HD content. It has two HDMI inputs for your digital HD sources and two USB ports for connecting compatible drives for computer-less multimedia playback.
